item.description:
Hello all,

We are hosting a penny, nickle, dime Poker night with games on Friday night. 

BYOB, Bring a snack, Bring your favorite game.

Allergy alert: We have a dog.

Don't forget to bring your $1.00 to help Nina with the cost of the meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: Tracy and James' house 168 Stratton Brook Rd. Simsbury CT

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Penny, nickle, dime Poker night and games at Tracy and James'
